subject: Slow Network Connection
description: I've been experiencing a consistently slow internet connection over the past few days. This slowdown is making it extremely challenging to perform my tasks efficiently. subject: Email Delivery Issues

This delay has resulted in missed communication and is affecting my ability to respond to important messages promptly. I rely heavily on email communication for my work, so it's crucial to resolve this issue swiftly. Please investigate and rectify the email delivery problem.
